Title: Ginga Nagareboshi Gin
Description: ['Gin is a silver Tora-ge named after his coat color. Shortly after being born, he watches his father, Riki, get killed by Akakabuto, a bear that terrorizes everything in his path. Being the third-generation of bear-dogs to try to stand up against Akakabuto, he ventures out to find dogs to join him in his fight. ', '\n', '\n']
Related: ['Adaptation: Yama no Susume', 'Prequel: Yama no Susume', 'Sequel: Yama no Susume: Second Season']
Voices: ['Yamada, Eiko', 'Ginga, Banjou', 'Tanaka, Hideyuki', 'Hori, Hideyuki', 'Ikemizu, Michihiro', 'Totani, Kouji', 'Tonguu, Kyouko', 'Tanaka, Ryouichi']
Staff: [['Katsumata, Tomoharu', 'Director'], ['Nishizawa, Nobutaka', 'Episode Director'], ['Terada, Kenji', 'Script'], ['Miyauchi, Takayuki', 'Theme Song Performance']]
